Game.Name: Wizard of the Immortal (Japan)
Game.plot: Meet the Maker! A gut-wrenching nightmare come to life. Terror reigns in his dungeon lair. Hurling toward your doom, you grasp one chance to live. Survive and win immortal fame. Eight lethal levels - 50 chambers filled with danger and deception. Full screen, real-time combat against creation's most evil creatures. Over 30 wickedly cunning, fully animated deaths await the unwary. Digitized soundtrack of fearsome screams and unearthly effects.Cheat: Alternative EndingOn Level 4, don't give the Ring to Ana to get an alternative ending once you beat the game.Cheat: Hidden Scene (Japanese version)After the credits are done, don't touch any buttons for 3 minutes and you'll see a hidden scene from the developers.
